summary: An email from the New Mexico Office of the Attorney General to an unspecified recipient, stating awareness of Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest and offering assistance for federal prosecution and potential state-level charges.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email; the sender learned through media that she was arrested and is facing Federal charges.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested and is facing Federal charges, as reported by media.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on or before July 2, 2020, and is facing Federal charges.
The New Mexico Office of the Attorney General is aware of the arrest and has offered to assist with the Federal prosecution.
The New Mexico Office of the Attorney General is also willing to pursue state-level charges against Ghislaine Maxwell if any viable charges exist.
